cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelfCheckout

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Server.

    Server contains a FIFO queue used to queue and then deque customers. maxQueueLength and restingProbability have to be initialized using their static methods before this class can be instantiated

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.PriorityQueue<Event> eventQueue
      Queue of events to be processed sorted by time using the EventComparator Event with the least time is processed first.
      protected java.lang.Integer id
      Unique id to identify each server instance.
      protected static int maxQueueLength 
      private static double restingProbability 
      protected java.lang.Integer served
      Total number of customers served.
      protected ServerState serverState
      Current state of the server Initialized to FREE at the start.
      protected java.util.Queue<Event> waitingQueue
      Queue storing custormers waiting to be served.
      protected java.lang.Double waitingTime
      Total waiting time.

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxQueueLength

        public static void setMaxQueueLength(java.lang.Integer maxQueueLength)
        Static method to initialize the maxQueueLength this configuration is shared among all instances of the server class.

        defaults maxQueueLength to 0

        Parameters:
        maxQueueLength - this is the maximum queue length for the server

      • setRestingProbability

        public static void setRestingProbability(double restingProbability)
        Static method to initialize the restingProbability this configuration is shared among all instances of the server class.

        restingProbability is set to 0 by default

        Parameters:
        restingProbability - represents the probability of each server going to rest
